summary: A small dungeon in southern Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
Hello all!!

Just finished reading the comments and I must say I am blown away. I honestly did not think anyone would like this and I am very happy that people did. I am working on some of the changes that were posted. I am the stage manager at my school theater and we are currently 3 days away from opening so I have been extremely busy and have not had a large amount of time. After this coming weekend however I will not have to be at school until the late evening so I can take some time and put some of these comments into practice :). 

If you are looking for more info on the dungeon I will be adding more screenshots along with my mod setup so you guys have an idea of what I am working with. 

As for location, the dungeon is located just past the Guardian Stones at the bottom of the lake. Ill upload a photo with the location of the map. Not exact but it should get you close enough until I can figure out how to actually add a quest, location marker etc. 

Special thanks to the user Vlammenzee for uploading a picture of the location on the map. I uploaded it to the main photos of the mod but all photo credit
to him for that photo. Cheers m8!

Again, Thank you all so much for your feedback and I will be working on fixing it up in the coming weeks :)
author: ShadyCornerz
